relevantArticles.articleTitle: Spring 定时任务 No qualifying bean of type TaskScheduler available 及 Could not find default TaskScheduler bean异常处理
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 最近使用 Spring + SpringMvc + Quartz 的系统中，使用@annotation 注解方式, 直接在类的方法上使用@Scheduled(cron=”0 /5 * * ?”)来实现定时任务，在使用 debug 日志级别时，启动提示 No qualifying bean of type TaskScheduler available 及 Could not find default TaskScheduler bean 异常。可以通过配置日志级别进行解决。

relevantArticles.articleTitle: Java Log4j 日志中的类路径显示首字母缩写
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: Java 在 Log4j 日志中显示首字母，如 com.abc.def.ClassName 日志中显示为 c.a.d.ClassName，方便调试，以及减少记录大小。

relevantArticles.articleTitle: Tomcat 配置导致启动时，项目加载两次的解决办法
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: Tomcat 在启动的时候，由于配置原因，导致工程会被加载两次，很容易出现内存溢出。如果有定时任务，也可能导致定时任务执行两次，从而出现问题。

relevantArticles.articleTitle: 解决梯子在GFWList模式下不能正常看流媒体的问题
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 客户端使用 GFWList 模式时观看流媒体。 问题描述：  当使用全局模式或大陆白名单模式时，可以观看流媒体 当使用 GFWList 模式时，无法观看（例如 HBO NOW） 当使用 GFWList 模式时，可以观看，但有卡顿（例如 YouTube）

relevantArticles.articleTitle: NoteExpress 实现文献检索、下载、管理、Word参考文献自动引用
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: NoteExpress 是一款通用参考文献管理软件， 是管理和使用参考文献资料和信息的首要选择。 对于大多数使用 NoteExpress 的用户来说，使用 NoteExpress 管理文献的主要目的便是文章撰写。NoteExpress 内置了多种国内外学术期刊、学位论文和国标的格式规范，通过 NoteExpress 插入文献，然后选择需要的格式进行格式化，可以快速自动地生成参考文献。

relevantArticles.articleTitle: 自建内网可用JRebel激活服务器
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 自建内网可用 JRebel 激活服务器，主要采用 JrebelLicenseServerforJava，部署于服务器上的 Tomcat 中提供服务。  服务器地址，打开后有使用说明：http://niuniu.hicp.net/jrebel

relevantArticles.articleTitle: A Web Developer’s Guide to Browser Caching
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: Caching is a useful yet surprisingly complex feature of Web browsers.  In this article, we’ll explain the how the browser uses its cache to load pages faster, which factors determine cache duration, and how we can bypass the cache when necessary.

relevantArticles.articleTitle: Pros and cons of end to end testing tools
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: My background in test automation is based on using Selenium WebDriver and Java. Since JavaScript has been widely used for testing web applications, I have decided to investigate tools currently available on the market. I will use these tools to make different scripts and hence find their advantages and disadvantages.  I have investigated the following tools and syntax for automation:  Selenium Webdriver + Java Selenium WebDriver + Cucumber + Java Selenium WebDriver + Jasmine syntax for JavaScrip....

relevantArticles.articleTitle: 3 ways to start Appium Server from Java
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: When you start learning Appium or start writing your first test script with it, your initial approach (especially from a beginner’s point of view) would be to start and stop the Appium server manually. Initially, a lot of people start working with the GUI based Appium versions.  GUI versions of Appium are easy to use, and users can easily start and stop the Appium server manually using the controls provided in the tool. After some time, many people would download and install the latest versions ....

If it’s taking more than 3 seconds then you should be really worried about your site speed. Because No-one really likes slow loading websites.  There is no meaning of doing all the hard work to produce amazing content because if your website is too slow to load, the user is going to get bounced from your website. So if you are really worried about your website speed and want to optimize it for your user and SEO you are at the right place.
